lead_paragraph: "The latest guise of the singer and songwriter Will Oldham, Bonnie (Prince) Billy sings rowdy and devastating songs in an Appalachian squeal that can be described only as miraculous," writes Amanda Petrusich. Tonight he is performing with the Cairo Gang, the alias of his longtime collaborator Emmett Kelly. At 8 and 10:15 p. m. at Monster Island Basement in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
